T

Topos - Class in iiit
This Class provides a purely stateless, persistent (in the immutable sense) API for -
Forming a graph data structure for a RNA given its residues (nodes) and cbond, hbond (edges) information. It provides means to extract information out the RAG (RNA as Graph) data structure thus formed. Additionally it provides implementations to find certain Topological structures like n-lets, stems, stem-loops, bulges, kissing-stem-loops. This API has been implemented in Clojure.
Topos() - Constructor for class iiit.Topos
 
ToposDemo - Class in iiit
Demo Class for iiit.Topos
ToposDemo() - Constructor for class iiit.ToposDemo
 

W

writeHBonds(String) - Static method in class iiit.HBonds
